name: Give Me My Houmous!
description:
Have you ever just felt like a dinosaur who's been really looking forward to a picnic? You've plodded out to the shops, bought some houmous, and maybe some other snacks.

You're excited to sit in the sun, kick back, relax, and read some Jurassic Park. Out of the blue, someone steals your things! Your arms may be tiny, and you have no idea how you'll read that book, but first things first - get your houmous back!
